verses.verse: And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee: though thou wast <S%H599>angry<s%> with me, thine <S%H639>anger<s%> is turned <S%H7725>away<s%>, and thou <S%H5162>comfortedst<s%> me.

Behold, <S%H410>God<s%> is my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>; I will <S%H982>trust<s%>, and not be <S%H6342>afraid<s%>: for the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H3068>JEHOVAH<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and my <S%H2176>song<s%>; he also is become my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
Therefore with <S%H8342>joy<s%> shall ye <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H4599>wells<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall ye <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3034>Praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H3045>declare<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>, make <S%H2142>mention<s%> that his <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted<s%>. call: or, proclaim
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> excellent <S%H1348>things<s%>: this is <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3045><s%> in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Cry <S%H6670>out<s%> and <S%H7442>shout<s%>, thou <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee. inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress
